item.title: Daily Lifestyle Checklist
item.description: See the disclaimers for full list of website disclaimers. A short guide to what I have found useful in my lifestyle over the past couple years based on the latest scientific evidence. Not something to be followed without consulting a doctor. Whole Foods Plant Based Food Plate Food Serving Notes Legumes 3 red Lentils, pinot beans, etc. berries 1 blue, black, strawberries, cranberries, barberries Cruciferous Veggies 3 Broccoli sprouts, arugula, kale, just hard veggies Greens 2 chard, spinach, etc.
